chunks.content: To request a new class bid at Driscoll Foods, email classbidrequest@driscollfoods.com with the customer name and customer number. This creates the bid in the system for subsequent configuration.

Bid File Price Maintenance: Menu 27 > Option 1. Prompt asks 'Current or Future bid? (C/F)' - enter C for current, F for future. Bid Types: CL = class bid, CU = customer bid. Enter bid number, then Down Arrow or F4 for toolbar.
Bid toolbar: A = Add new item to bid. C = Maintain/update existing item pricing. Access toolbar via F4 or Down Arrow after entering bid number.

Bid locking options: L = Lock prices for current week or future dates. R = Reserve lock (ideal for percent-based items like weekly produce). Unlocked bids auto-update when buyers change prices. Use R for items priced as percentages that change weekly.
After changing bid pricing, press U in toolbar to update all already-entered orders with future delivery dates. This pushes the new pricing to orders that were entered before the price change.
Bid items appear as blue text with a red 'B' indicator when searching in the Alpha during order entry. This confirms the item is on the customer's active bid.
Copy class bid: Menu 27 > 1 > C (current) > CL > enter source bid number > F4 to end > type COPY > enter destination customer/bid number.
Copy call sheet to bid: Menu 27 > 1 > C (current) > CU > enter customer number > Down Arrow > type COPY > enter destination bid number in NEW CUSTOMER/CLASS field.
